en: Beauford Delaney sketchbook dated 1938. Contains meditations of Beauford Delaney’s time spent with Selma Burke on a boat ride along the Harlem River and a trip to Ellis Wilson’s studio. Contains graphite sketches from the outing along the Harlem River. Artist Rex Goreleigh is mentioned in the sketchbook. Contains sketches of expressionistic landscapes and classical anatomical and portrait studies.

Beauford Delaney sketchbook dated 1938. Contains meditations of Beauford Delaney’s time spent with Selma Burke on a boat ride along the Harlem River and a trip to Ellis Wilson’s studio. Contains graphite sketches from the outing along the Harlem River. Artist Rex Goreleigh is mentioned in the sketchbook. Contains sketches of expressionistic landscapes and classical anatomical and portrait studies.

seo.title: Beauford Delaney sketchbook, book 24 - Beauford Delaney Notebooks and Sketchbooks
seo.description: Beauford Delaney sketchbook dated 1938. Contains meditations of Beauford Delaney’s time spent with Selma Burke on a boat ride along the Harlem River and a trip to Ellis Wilson’s studio. Contains graphite sketches from the outing along the Harlem River. Artist Rex Goreleigh is mentioned in the sketchbook. Contains sketches of expressionistic landscapes and classical anatomical and portrait studies.
